backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining user profiles, moments, challenges, chat, connections, and storage with authorization and sample connection data.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new state types and a no-op run function returning the existing state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing export-related features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions with light/dark modes and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app via root div and main.tsx script.
frontend/scripts/export-version11-config: Configuration for export script defining included roots, excluded patterns, and output directory.
frontend/scripts/export-version11.ts: Script that copies project files into a clean export folder and generates a README with sharing instructions.
frontend/share/version11/.exportignore: Ignore file documenting patterns excluded from the version11 export.
frontend/share/version11/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file ensuring the directory is tracked in Git.
frontend/share/version11/README.md: Export README explaining contents and instructions for sharing the version11 snapshot.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack router, query client, layout, and protected routes for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Handles initial user profile creation with avatar, interests, and redirects after saving.
frontend/src/components/comfort/ComfortM: Provides a context to read and toggle comfort mode, syncing changes to the user profile.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Transie: Displays a temporary dismissible banner with auto-hide and fade animations.
frontend/src/components/highlights/Weekl: Shows the top weekly highlight or an empty state if none exist.
frontend/src/components/layout/ZenLayout: Layout wrapper that renders navigation and page content inside a themed container.
frontend/src/components/nav/ZenNav.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with auth controls, responsive mobile menu, and route links.
frontend/src/components/profile/EmojiAva: Lets users select an emoji avatar from a predefined set with visual selection states.
frontend/src/components/profile/TagMulti: Multi-select component for predefined tags with support for adding custom values.
frontend/src/constants/allowedAvatars.ts: Defines allowed emoji avatars and an avatar validation helper.
frontend/src/constants/profileOptions.ts: Defines static lists of predefined interests and perspectives plus associated types.
frontend/src/data/globalChatSeed.ts: Provides seed messages for the global chat with content, metadata, and avatars.
frontend/src/data/mockCircles.ts: Contains mock circle data for local-only navigation with basic circle fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboardingCompleti: Stores and retrieves a completion message in sessionStorage for onboarding flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching and mutating various backend resources using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode settings, and custom UI utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements a chat interface supporting message sending, profile lookup, and partner selection handling.
frontend/src/pages/CircleDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a selected circle using mock data, with sections for about, chat, and guidelines, and handles missing circles.
frontend/src/pages/CirclesPage.tsx: Lists available circles from mock data and provides a dialog to create new circles, with navigation to individual circle pages.
frontend/src/pages/DailyChallengesPage.t: Shows daily challenges fetched from a query with streak tracking and allows marking challenges as complete.
frontend/src/pages/DebateRoomsPage.tsx: Displays a list of debate rooms and a room view where users can raise or lower their hand and see room details.
frontend/src/pages/EmotionalSafetyPage.t: Presents informational sections describing the app’s AI-supported emotional safety features and user controls.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalChartPage.tsx: Fetches and displays global stats including active users, trending MBTI types, and emotional trends with a world map visual.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalChatPage.tsx: Implements a global chat interface with message posting, perspective selection, and fallback seed messages when the backend is empty.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main dashboard with navigation, user profile info, motivational quotes, and featured weekly content.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Provides the public landing page with a hero section, authentication entry point, and an overview of ZenLink’s vision.
frontend/src/pages/MatchingPage.tsx: Shows community members, allows connecting or starting conversations, and handles connection state and errors.
frontend/src/pages/MbtiQuizPage.tsx: Presents an MBTI quiz, tracks progress, computes personality type, and saves the result to the user profile.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile editing page that loads the caller's profile, allows updating fields like display name, avatar, and interests, and saves changes via API mutations.
Displays top weekly moments grouped into categories with loading state and styled highlight cards.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyMomentsPage.tsx: Shows weekly moments, allows submitting a new moment via dialog, and supports incrementing impact on existing moments.
frontend/src/utils/strings.ts: Provides string normalization and comparison helpers for case- and trim-insensitive matching.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and container settings with custom theme values.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and export requirements for Version 11.
